channel.title: Python on Mark LeBoeuf
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Mark LeBoeuf

item.title: Forecasting with External Regressors
item.description: This post focuses on some of my favorite things – data, sports, and forecasting – and will outline how to leverage external regressors when creating forecasts. We’ll do some webscraping in R and Python to create our dataset, and then forecast how many people will visit Tom Brady’s wikipedia page.
